title: [Lols] Giveway
body:
Congratulations to Dota2ForTheWin and Best Burrito OCE 

Dota2ForTheWin you get the choice of a skin/champion or combination adding up to a total of 975 RP for having the most votes.
Best Burrito OCE you get the choice of a skin/champion or combination adding up to a total of 790 RP for being picked as the having the best artwork by Riot Maraudaur. 

Thanks for participating! Add me in-game on "LOLS" to begin the 2 week friending process which upon conclusion you will receive your rewards.

Regards,
lols =)

replies.body:
At Dota2forthewin and Best Burrito AU you will both be receiving $10 worth of RP tonight if the gifting passes. This way you will be able to get whatever you want without any hassle. 

Regards,
lols =)

> [{quoted}](name=lols,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=LUEAhmvJ,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2014-12-11T21:21:50.583+0000)
> At Dota2forthewin and Best Burrito AU you will both be receiving $10 worth of RP tonight if the gifting passes. This way you will be able to get whatever you want without any hassle. 
> 
> Regards,
> lols =)

i thought i was gonna choose i get to spend it on.
but the mystery gift was still sweet, do much rp do i have left?

{{champion:79}} {{champion:79}} {{champion:79}} {{champion:79}} {{champion:79}} {{champion:79}} {{champion:79}}
Best Burrito OCE is Silver trash that doesn't deserve the name.
yay, some rp i get to spend in 3-4 months
